ENJOYED being at this free #AXOR event this morning. What an inspiring panel designer Phillip Stark, architect Cung-Yi Yang at Antonio Citterio along Rebecca Wrigold and AnjecDohn. It’s on again this afternoon.  What a great example of inspired innovation…https://t.co/XjeKkmIqY1

#optimism  and #goodnews  are in shortage – however paired with #curiosity and #creativity – both crucial to #criticalthinking   – we have to core skills to become active #changemakers  and ask better questions about the #future  #today https://t.co/JXWA7pKCq3

Can't wait to join everyone at #FutureTenseConference in June – my talk will be on #FutureGovernance
